selected_quotes: Over 75 AED members contributed to the ground-breaking work, The Wiley Handbook of Eating Disorders!
#EatingDisorders Awareness week, . Coming soon, Handbook of Eating Disorders, see more
Great catching up with Michael Levine at #ICED2017 – come find his book at the Wiley stand
Eating Disorders in Boys and Men by Linda Smolak, Michael Levine, Lina Ricciardelli, Marita McCabe

facebook.title: Wiley: The Wiley Handbook of Eating Disorders - Linda Smolak, Michael P. Levine
facebook.summary: Over 75 AED members contributed to this groundbreaking two-volume handbook that provides a comprehensive collection of evidence-based analyses of the causes, treatment, and prevention of eating disorders. What an achievement!

facebook.title: Wiley: The Wiley Handbook of Eating Disorders - Linda Smolak, Michael P. Levine
facebook.summary: This book presents comprehensive coverage of eating disorders ranging across history, etiological factors, diagnosis, assessment, prevention, treatment, social policy, and advocacy. ERC's Dr. Emmet Bishop contributed the chapter on Dialectical Behavioral T

facebook.title: Wiley: The Wiley Handbook of Eating Disorders - Linda Smolak, Michael P. Levine
facebook.summary: This book features the contributions of over 75 AED members and presents comprehensive coverage of eating disorders ranging across history, etiological factors, diagnosis, assessment, prevention, treatment, social policy, and advocacy

facebook.title: Wiley: The Wiley Handbook of Eating Disorders - Linda Smolak, Michael P. Levine
facebook.summary: "This groundbreaking two-volume handbook [contributed by more than 75 AED members) provides a comprehensive collection of evidence-based analyses of the causes, treatment, and prevention of eating disorders."
